text:
Cristiana Silva (born 2000 in Porto) is a Portuguese model and beauty pageant titleholder who was appointed as Miss Universe Portugal 2020 and represented Portugal at Miss Universe 2020.
Miss República Portuguesa 2019.
Silva began her pageantry career representing Porto in the Miss República Portuguesa 2019 competition on July 28, 2019. She placed as the 1st Runner-up and lost to eventual winner Inês Brusselmans. On August 19, 2020, Silva was appointed as Miss Universe Portugal 2020 and succeeded outgoing Sylvie Silva.
Miss Universe 2020.
As the official representative of her country at the Miss Universe 2020 pageant.
